data.message: Why are you forcing people to install two apps on their phones (messenger and Facebook). I don't want a separate app for messaging, it always used to be within the main Facebook app but for about a year now its unavailable within the app. I don't like clutter, I don't want two apps! All this has done is get me to use texting more, please bring back messenger to the Facebook app!

replies.message: Hey Justin, we hear your concern. Separating messages from the Facebook app into Messenger allows us to provide a better overall experience to the Facebook community. We do appreciate your feedback and work hard to make the Facebook experience enjoyable for everyone. Please share your suggestion with us here: http://bit.ly/2e4Cbbr. -Elizabeth
fb can you see my messages (messenger) for you? Please help me ..
Eliminate the requirement to use a particular app to send messages!!
Facebook that's such a bs lie

Facebook Jag behöver hjälp med översättning. Till våren tänker jag gå den omtalade resan aom Agneta Sjödin och nu kom jag på alla med en dystoni är välkomna, <jag er i helgen placerad vid min dator för att se mer och veta mer-
vdet jag vet nu är att Anita Sjödin har godt den hur längt vet jag ej och det avgör man själv. Jag har bott i Uppsala i 30 år
Facebook - thats a pretty poor responce.
